snippet: Ms. Eichwald paints effortlessly in ways at once nasty and nice, fluid and crusty, weird and astute.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibit of works by painter Michaela Eichwald at Reena Spaulings Fine Art gallery.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Eichwald paints effortlessly in ways at once nasty and nice, fluid and crusty, weird and astute.

headline.print_headline: Michaela Eichwald: ‘Ergriffenes Dasein: Artist, Writer, Mentalist’
headline.main: Michaela Eichwald: ‘Ergriffenes Dasein: Artist, Writer, Mentalist’
